sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import {Collapse} from 'react-bootstrap'; import firebase from '../config'; class SidebarPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { userRole: '', loading: false, orderStatusList: [], usePermList: [] }; } componentDidMount() { this.setState({loading: true}); var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("RoleId"); if (sessionId) { firebase .database() .ref('admin_users/' + sessionId) .on('value', snapshot => { var Users = snapshot.val(); console.log(Users); sessionStorage.setItem("userName", Users.fullName); sessionStorage.setItem("userRole", Users.Role); this.setState({userRole: Users.Role, loading: false}); console.log(this.state.userRole); this.ordersSliders(); }); } } ordersSliders() { this.setState({loading: true}); var ref = firebase .database() .ref("orderStatus"); ref.on('value', snapshot => { const data = []; snapshot.forEach(childSnapShot => { const orderStatus = { categoryId: childSnapShot .key .toString(), orderStatus: childSnapShot .val() .orderStatus }; data.push(orderStatus); }); this.setState({orderStatusList: data, loading: false}); }); } componentWillMount() { var sessionId = sessionStorage.getItem("userRole"); this.setState({loading: true}); var ref = firebase .database() .ref("Role") .orderByChild("Role") .equalTo(sessionId); ref.on('value', snapshot => { const data = []; snapshot.forEach(childSnapShot => { const orderStatus = { RoleId: childSnapShot .key .toString(), dashboard: childSnapShot .val() .dashboard, orders: childSnapShot .val() .orders, products: childSnapShot .val() .products, category: childSnapShot .val() .category, subCategory: childSnapShot .val() .subCategory, invoices: childSnapShot .val() .invoices, abandonedCart: childSnapShot .val() .abandonedCart, coupons: childSnapShot .val() .coupons, merchantPayments: childSnapShot .val() .merchantPayments, AdminStaff: childSnapShot .val() .AdminStaff, merchantMangement: childSnapShot .val() .merchantMangement, notifications: childSnapShot .val() .notifications, users: childSnapShot .val() .users, settings: childSnapShot .val() .settings, Analytics: childSnapShot .val() .Analytics, sliders: childSnapShot .val() .sliders, enquiry: childSnapShot .val() .enquiry }; data.push(orderStatus); }); this.setState({usePermList: data[0], loading: false}); console.log(this.state.usePermList); console.log(this.state.usePermList.orders); }); } render() { return (
{/* Shopality */}

); } isPathActive(path) { return this .props .location .pathname .startsWith(path); } } export default withRouter(SidebarPage);
